entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (nova_orion_dexen_eronoss.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_12: One of our freighters broke down. I need you to pick up the parts needed to repair it and then escort it as it completes its delivery.
entries.s_13: One of our transports has gone missing. I need you to find it.
entries.s_14: Ah, you're back. Good timing...I have a critical assignment for you. One of our transports has gone missing. I need you to find it.
entries.s_16: Well done. I'm knew you'd be a good addition to the Nova Orion team! I have a new assignment for you. One of our freighters broke down. I need you to pick up the parts needed to repair it and then escort it as it completes its delivery.
entries.s_18: There are pirates out there who would like nothing more than to get their hands on one of our transports. So don't waste any time!
entries.s_24: Escort a freighter as it makes some deliveries. Stay wary...we've had trouble with pirates and the like lately.
entries.s_26: I've heard good things about you, so I'm glad you're here. And just in time too. I need you to escort a freighter as it makes some deliveries.
entries.s_28: I'll take care of it right away.
entries.s_30: Excellent. Keep an eye out...we've had trouble with pirates and the like lately.
entries.s_32: You're not qualified to work for me yet.
entries.s_5: Good job recovering our transport. Ah, hmmm. Apparently something has come up. You need to report to Skyron Waurie as soon as possible. He's a security supervisor. I'm not sure what's happening, but Mr. Waurie has made it very clear that you are needed. And soon.
entries.s_8: It was good working with you.
